product_name: MoroccanoilTravel Size Perfect Defense Heat Protectant
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Perfect Defense Heat Protectant is a weightless, dry spray that protects against thermal damage and hot tools.
details: DetailsBenefitsProtects from heat up to 450°F/230°CWeightless, no holdFor all hair types and all hot toolsWorks on damp or dry hairKey IngredientsArgan Oil: Hydrates and nurtures the hair with tocopherols (vitamin E), essential fatty acids, and antioxidantsPanthenol: A form of vitamin B5 that hydrates and imparts a glossy finishOctylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer: Provides thermal protectionItem 2644250How To UseMist generously and evenly 6 inches away from damp hair. Comb through and blow-dry. Style with a hot tool.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50°C (122°F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.IngredientsDimethyl Ether, Sd Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/ Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Achillea Millefolium (Common Yarrow) Extract, Geranium Maculatum (Spotted Cranesbill) Extract, Lentinus Edodes (Shiitake Mushroom) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Parfum/Fragrance, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aminomethyl Propanol, Panthenol, Cetearamidoethyldiethonium Succinoyl Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Glycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, PPG-12 Dimethicone, Hydroxypropyl Methacrylate, Benzoic Acid, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalyl Acetate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Vanillin, Lavandula (Lavender) Oil/Extract. MOPD02Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Mist generously and evenly 6 inches away from damp hair. Comb through and blow-dry. Style with a hot tool.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50°C (122°F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Not good tbh
reviews.comments: This heat protectant SUCKS. It dries my hair out every time doesn't provide any hydration. I have slightly thick wavy hair and it is dry and slightly damaged. I thought it would offer some benefits other than heat protectant like softening or hydration but none, zero, nada. Also ALLLL of the reviews on ULTA are paid reviews. I've tried posting my negative review three times and it won't let me. Seems fishy tbh. Anyways this heat protectant feels like a hairspray going on as well, if you have fine hair that doesn't hold a curl maybe this is for you. But personally this is not my fave.

reviews.headline: Perfect for Travel, Same Great Results
reviews.comments: I love this heat protectant! It feels so light in my hair and doesn't weigh it down at all. I've noticed my hair looks shinier and healthier after styling, and I feel better knowing it's protected from heat. The spray is easy to use on both damp and dry hair, and it layers well with my other products. Definitely a staple in my routine. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Loveee
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil I absolutely love it! Everything Moroccanoil smells incredible. I appreciate that it can be used both dry and wet, and it seamlessly blends into my styling routine. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Effortlessly blends into hair routine
reviews.comments: Complimentary from moroccanoil I love this brand! Anything Morocanoil smells amazing. I love that you can use while dry or wet. It blends effortlessly into my styling routine. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Will definitely be purchasing in the future!
reviews.comments: Truly in love with this heat protector! It's a very light spray onto your hair, so there will be no product build up and the luster it adds to my hair is great! Also the smell is wonderful! It contains their signature scent! Gifted by Moroccanoil

reviews.headline: I would definitely bye this again….
reviews.comments: Loving this heat protector and the luster plus shine that it adds to my hair! Also the smell is AMAZING! It contains their signature DNA scent! It's such a lightweight spray, so your hair surely will not be weighed down by product. Gifted by Moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Great heat protectant
reviews.comments: The perfect Defense Heat Protectant was gifted by morracanoil from Ulta and it's a breeze to apply, and I love that the formula is designed to work with all hair types. After using it, my hair feels noticeably softer, and I've seen a real reduction in frizz and split ends, especially when I'm styling with my flat iron.

reviews.headline: Really like it!
reviews.comments: I tried the Perfect Defense Heat Protectant, gifted by moroccanoil to test, and it's quickly become a staple in my routine. This is a great product for anyone who uses heat tools regularly. The spray is incredibly fine and lightweight, so it doesn't leave any residue or make my hair feel sticky or heavy.

reviews.headline: Hydrated my hair and smells amazing!
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by moroccanoil. I loved using this product because it hydrated my hair before styling. It also made my hair smell so amazing and look so healthy. I also love that I can keep it in my travel bag so I can style my hair on vacation without having to have the full size. I will definitely be purchasing this product myself when I run out!

reviews.headline: Smells amazing and hydrated my hair before styling!
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by moroccanoil. I loved using this product because it smelled so amazing my hair. It was like putting dry shampoo in my hair. After straightening, it made my hair smell so amazing and look so healthy and shiny, I will definitely be using this product over and over again when I style my hair.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil, this heat protectant has done wonders for my hair. It smells good and leaves my hair feeling weightless and shiny as well. Definitely will recommend and keep this as part of my routine

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Complimentary from moroccanoil, this heat protectant has done wonders for my hair. It smells good and leaves my hair feeling weightless and shiny as well. I love adding this into my hair routine. Loving the results

reviews.headline: Really nice
reviews.comments: Amazing product!!! The mist is super fine and coats hair evenly, plus the scent is so nice. Leaves my hair smooth and safe from heat styling. Perfect size for travel too! And it has a great scent! Lightweight, effective, and a new favorite! Complimentary from MoroccanOil

reviews.headline: Pretty good!
reviews.comments: Love this heat protectant!! The scent is fresh, and it sprays evenly without leaving buildup. My hair feels soft and protected every time I style. Definitely a must-have! Complimentary from MoroccanOil

reviews.headline: Protects my hair
reviews.comments: The Moroccanoil Travel Size Perfect Defense Heat Protectant makes styling so much easier, especially when traveling. It's lightweight, simple to use, and works on both damp and dry hair. I love that it protects up to 450°F without leaving buildup or weighing my hair down. My hair feels safe from heat and looks healthy after every style. This product was gifted by Moroccanoil.

reviews.headline: Perfect to take on the go
reviews.comments:
The Moroccanoil Travel Size Perfect Defense Heat Protectant is so convenient to take on the go. It's weightless, easy to use, and perfect for travel. I like that I can use it on both damp and dry hair, and it protects against heat up to 450°F without leaving any hold or buildup. My hair feels protected and looks healthy every time I style it.
This was gifted by Moroccanoil.

The Perfect Defense Heat Protectant by Moroccanoil is a 10/10 . Doesn't leave a residue in your hair afterwards. The package is nice and easy to open and easy to use! This is will be my go to when I need a little freshen up. Gifted by moroccanoil

The Perfect Defense Heat Protectant by Moroccanoil is a really high quality heat protector that you will want to invest in. Gets the job done, doesn't have a strong odor, and doesn't leave a white residue. Complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Recommend!
reviews.comments: This was gifted to me by Moroccanoil in exchange for my honest review.  I have been using the same heat protectant for several years now but I think I may have found a new favorite! Can be used on both damp and dry hair, weightless, non-greasy,  and leaves the hair smooth. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Happy with results!
reviews.comments: The Perfect Defense Heat Protectant was gifted by Moroccanoil in exchange for my honest review. I was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked this product. I used it on damp hair before my blowout. It was non-greasy, weightless, and my hair was left smooth. I was happy with the results and I would definitely purchase and recommend!

media.headline: I like it, I've never tried a heat protector that's aerosol
Shiny, smooth hair with no buildup

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using this Moroccanoil heat protectant for a little while, and I honestly enjoy it a lot. The texture is very light, so it doesn't weigh my hair down or make it greasy, which is something I often worry about with sprays. It goes on evenly, dries quickly, and leaves a nice soft feeling without any stickiness.

The smell is also amazing — fresh but not overpowering, and it lingers just a little bit after styling. I noticed that after blow-drying and straightening, my hair looks smoother and shinier, and it doesn't feel as dry on the ends as it usually does.

The size is also very convenient — easy to throw in a bag if you're traveling or going to the gym. Overall, it has become a really useful step in my routine, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to protect their hair from heat damage while keeping it soft and healthy. Gifted by Moroccanoil
faceoff_positive.headline: Great

Anyways this heat protectant feels like a hairspray going on as well, if you have fine hair that doesn't hold a curl maybe this is for you. But personally this is not my fave.
